DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the safety and effectiveness of the CardioFocus Endoscopic Ablation System with Adaptive Contact in the treatment of atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Post-Market Clinical Study of the CardioFocus Endoscopic Ablation System - Adaptive Contact (CF-EAS-AC) for the Treatment of Symptomatic Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic, Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation (AF) 18 to 70 Years of age Others Generally good overall health as determined by multiple criteria Willing to participate in a study Others
